About

Hi! I am Sebastian, a young programming enthusiast and this is my personal blog. I am 16 years old and currently in my junior year. I participate in a lot of software development related contests and activities. This blog is mostly about the highlights of my life and personal opinions related to coding. Check out my activity on Github and Twitter.

Thanks for reading!
